title: SportsData
description: The William Hill SportsData REST API is a collection of GET methods to provide William Hill product data such as sport, competition, event, market and selection data (including prices).

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

status.description: Indicates if the class is (A)ctive or (S)uspended

betInRunningDelay.description: Delay in seconds between bet being sent and bet being placed

cashinAvailable.description: Indicates whether cashin is available on the events of this competition

channels.description: A list of channels that apply to this competition

displayed.description: Whether the competition should be displayed or not

flags.description: A list of flags that apply to this competition

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published or not

order.description: The display order of the competition

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

status.description: The status of the competition (A for Active, S for Suspended)

code.description: The William Hill API Error Code

field.description: Optional field to point to the field with an error

betInRunningDelay.description: Delay in seconds between bet being sent and bet being placed

cashinAvailable.description: Whether cashin is available on this event

channels.description: A list of channels that apply to this event

country.description: A string indicating the country code of this event if available

displayed.description: whether the event should be displayed or not

eventSort.description: What type of event is this? (e.g. MTCH, TRNMT)

flags.description: A list of flags that apply to this event

hasInPlayMarkets.description: Whether this event has inplay markets

hasLivePrices.description: Whether this event has Live Prices

isInPlay.description: Whether this event has started and therefore is inplay

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

marketCountActiveInPlay.description: Count of active markets in play

markets.description: A list of markets belonging to this event

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

settled.description: Whether the event has been settled

startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the event

status.description: Status of the event (A for Active, S for Suspended)

channels.description: A channel indicates where an entry can be accessed. Its made up of a string containing a number of characters

displayed.description: Indicates if the item should be displayed

eachWay.description: Indicates if each way betting is available

eachWayFactorDen.description:
Where each way terms are stored with the bet, this holds the denominator for the each way
factor. For example, if the each way terms are: 5 places pay ¼, this value will be 4

eachWayFactorNum.description:
Where each way terms are stored with the bet, this holds the numerator for the each way
factor. For example, if the each way terms are: 5 places pay ¼, this value will be 1

eachWayPlaces.description:
Where each way terms are stored with the bet, this holds the number of places paid. For
example, if the each way terms are: 5 places pay ¼, this value will be 5

hcapValue.description: This value indicates the current handicap set on the Event Market, assuming it has a handicap type.

id.description: ID (e.g. OB_MA{id} (e.g. OB_MA1), OB_SP (Sport), OB_CL (Class), OB_TY (Competition / type), OB_EV (event) OB_MA (Market), OB_OU (Selection / outcome)

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

marketGroupCollectionId.description: The collectionId of the Market Group inherited from

marketGroupId.description: The group id the market was inherited from

marketGroupName.description: The group name the market was inherited from

marketSort.description: The sort defines the market template

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

selections.description: A list of selections belonging to the market

settled.description: Whether the market is settled or not

status.description: Indicates the status of the Market (A = Active/S = Suspended)

collectionId.description: The collectionId of the Market Group, If it has one

competitionId.description: The CompetitionId of the Market Group

id.description: The Id of the Market Group

name.description: The Name of the Market Group

decimal.description: The decimal format of the price

fractional.description: The fractional format of the price or EVS when the price evens.

channels.description: A list of channels that applies to this selection

csAway.description: The away score in a correct score event

csHome.description: The home score in a correct score event

displayed.description: Wether this selection should be displayed or not

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

oddsDecimal.description: The selection price, in decimal format

oddsFractional.description: The selection price, in fractional format

order.description: The display order of the selection

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

runnerNum.description: The runner number in race events

settled.description: Wether this selection has been settled or not

status.description: The status of the selection (A for Active or S for Suspended)

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

weight.description: The weighting of the bet in the Top bets ranking

actions.title: getCompetitionsForClass
actions.description: Retrieves a list of competitions for a given class id.

apiKey.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

classId.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

isPublished.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

fields.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

include.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

exclude.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

displayed.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

channel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

status.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

sort.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

offset.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

limit.description: Specify the number of results to return

culture.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

actions.title: getEventsForClass
actions.description: Retrieves a list of events for a given class id. 'includeAllDescendants' parameter should be accompanied with 'date' filter or one of 'dateFrom' and 'dateTo' filters.

apiKey.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

classId.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

isPublished.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

fields.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

include.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

exclude.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

displayed.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

channel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

settled.description: Specify wether only settled entities should be returned

includeEmpty.description: When declared as false it should exclude markets and events that have no selections / markets

status.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

sort.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

offset.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

limit.description: Specify the number of results to return

headlineSummary.description: Return only headline markets (Markets with the lowest display order) Either 1 InPlay and 1 Pre-Match, or the amount specified in marketCount, if available. Markets and Outcomes will be returned.

includeAllDescendants.description: Include every descendant in the below heirarchy

isInPlay.description: Show only events that are in-play

marketCount.description: Specify the number of markets to return when requesting headlineSummary. This count of InPlay and Pre-Match markets will be returned.For example, when specifying 1, 1 In Play and 1 Pre Match market will be returned.

date.description: Return only events for the specified date (yyyy-MM-dd).

dateFrom.description: The UTC datetime from the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

dateTo.description: The UTC datetime TO the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

culture.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

marketPublished.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

marketStatus.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

marketDisplayed.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

marketChannel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

marketSort.description: Filter by market sort  (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

marketEW.description: Specify whether to return markets with each way betting or those without

selectionStatus.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

selectionChannel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

selectionPublished.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

apiKey.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

competitionId.description: The competition id to retrieve information for.

fields.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

include.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

exclude.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

culture.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

actions.title: getTopBets
actions.description: Retrieves a weighted list of Selections.

apiKey.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

sportIds.description: A comma-separated list of sportsIds for which to retrieve topBets for

competitionIds.description: A comma-separated list of competitionIds for which to retrieve topBets for

limit.description: Specify the number of results to return

fields.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

include.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

exclude.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

param_topBetEventId.description: The event ID to retrieve top bet information for. Multiple events up to 5 may be used

sortName.description: The market sort code used to further filter event results. Please note this can only be used with event id(s).

culture.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

Locale.description: Code used to select a set of top bets settings, default is "whapi" which allows events set in far future to be included, setting the value to "en-GB" will activate english sportsbook settings, mirroring top bets on the website, which restricts events returned to those taking place in next 36 hours.  Acceptable values (not all heve their own settings - if none currently available for that locale - en-GB will be used) are  de-DE|whapi|en-GB|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR
